history.author: mark_bailets
history.post: Dr Silverman is one brilliant individual! I missed the ‘Trial of the Shroud of Turin’, yet was able to hear you on The X Zone 11 17 2010. It is so true that that you can produce all the fact based data in the world and not reach people that are not ready to accept that which they have categorically rejected. I respect your level of patience and persistence..
history.title: Trial of the Shroud of Turin at Newman University in Wichita
